thread.title: Sun-drenched and pleasant, finishing crisp - Saturday weather forecast
thread.title_full: Sun-drenched and pleasant, finishing crisp - Saturday weather forecast

author: Lulama Klassen
title: Sun-drenched and pleasant, finishing crisp - Saturday weather forecast
text:
Good morning, Cape {town} Etc family. Here is your weather forecast for today, 20 December.
Today’s weather in Cape Town features a sunny day, with a high of 26°C and a low of 19°C.
The UV index will reach an extreme level of 12.
Expect 0% cloud cover during the day and 1% this evening.
A south-southeasterly wind will travel across the Cape at a speed of 32kph, with gusts reaching 76kph during the day.
This evening, a southeasterly wind will travel through the city at a speed of 20kph, with gusts reaching 76kph.
There is a 0% probability of precipitation for today
You can catch the sunrise at 5:31am and the sunset at 7:56pm.
Have a brilliantly sunny Saturday!
